description: Used to send and receive updates about GNodes. GNodes are the building blocks of Gridworks. They have slowly-changing state that must be kept in sync across a distributed system. Therefore, they require a global registry to act as Single Source of Truth (SSoT). This class is used for that SSoT to share information with actors about their GNodes, and the GNodes that they will observe and communicate with.

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

AlgoAddressStringFormat.description: String of length 32, characters are all base32 digits.

GNodeRole000.name: g.node.role.000
GNodeRole000.description: Categorizes GNodes by their function within GridWorks

oneOf.title: GNode
oneOf.description: Default value

oneOf.title: TerminalAsset
oneOf.description: An avatar for a real-word Transactive Device

oneOf.title: AtomicTNode
oneOf.description: Transacts in markets on behalf of, and controlling the power use of, a TerminalAsset

oneOf.title: MarketMaker
oneOf.description: Runs energy markets at its Node in the GNodeTree

oneOf.title: AtomicMeteringNode
oneOf.description: Role of a GNode that will become an AtomicTNode, prior to it owning TaTradingRights

oneOf.title: ConductorTopologyNode
oneOf.description: An avatar for a real-world electric grid node - e.g. a substation or transformer

oneOf.title: InterconnectionComponent
oneOf.description: An avatar for a cable or wire on the electric grid

oneOf.title: World
oneOf.description: Adminstrative GNode responsible for managing and authorizing instances

oneOf.title: TimeCoordinator
oneOf.description: Responsible for managing time in simulations

oneOf.title: Supervisor
oneOf.description: Responsible for GNode actors running in a container

oneOf.title: Scada
oneOf.description: GNode associated to the device and code that directly monitors and actuates a Transactive Device

oneOf.title: PriceService
oneOf.description: Provides price forecasts for markets run by MarketMakers

oneOf.title: WeatherService
oneOf.description: Provides weather forecasts

oneOf.title: AggregatedTNode
oneOf.description: An aggregation of AtomicTNodes

oneOf.title: Persister
oneOf.description: Responsible for acking events with delivery guarantees

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: Default value

oneOf.title: Pending
oneOf.description: The GNode exists but cannot be used yet.

oneOf.title: Active
oneOf.description: The GNode can be used.

oneOf.title: PermanentlyDeactivated
oneOf.description: The GNode can no longer be used, now or in the future.

oneOf.title: Suspended
oneOf.description: The GNode cannot be used, but may become active in the future.

Alias.title: Structured mutable identifier for GNode
Alias.description: The GNode Aliases are used for organizing how actors in Gridworks communicate. Together, they also encode the known topology of the electric grid.

GNodeRegistryAddr.title: Algorand address for GNodeRegistry
GNodeRegistryAddr.description: For actors in a Gridworks world, the GNodeRegistry is the Single Source of Truth for existence and updates to GNodes.

PrevAlias.title: Previous GNodeAlias
PrevAlias.description: As the topology of the grid updates, GNodeAliases will change to reflect that. This may happen a handful of times over the life of a GNode.

GpsPointId.title: Lat/lon of GNode
GpsPointId.description: Some GNodes, in particular those acting as avatars for physical devices that are part of or are attached to the electric grid, have physical locations. These locations are used to help validate the grid topology.

OwnershipDeedId.title: Algorand Id of ASA Deed
OwnershipDeedId.description: The Id of the TaDeed Algorand Standard Asset if the GNode is a TerminalAsset.

OwnershipDeedValidatorAddr.title: Algorand address of Validator
OwnershipDeedValidatorAddr.description: Deeds are issued by the GNodeFactory, in partnership with third party Validators.

OwnerAddr.title: Algorand address of the deed owner

DaemonAddr.title: Algorand address of the daemon app
DaemonAddr.description: Some GNodes have Daemon applications associated to them to handle blockchain operations.

TradingRightsId.title: Algorand Id of ASA TradingRights
TradingRightsId.description: The Id of the TradingRights Algorand Standard Asset.

ComponentId.title: Unique identifier for GNode's Component
ComponentId.description: Used if a GNode is an avatar for a physical device. The serial number of a device is different from its make/model. The ComponentId captures the specific instance of the device.
